content.query:
DROP TABLE [stage].[Crimes];
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [stage].[Crimes]
( 
	[id] [bigint]  IDENTITY (1,1) NOT NULL,
	[CASE NUMBER] [nvarchar](50),
	[DATE] [datetime],
	[Block] [varchar](50),
	[IUCR] [nvarchar](50),
	[Primary Type] [nvarchar](255),
	[Description] [nvarchar](4000),
	[Location Description] [nvarchar](4000),
    [Arrest] [BIT],
    [Domestic] [BIT],
    [Beat] [varchar](20),
    [District][varchar](20),
    [Ward][int],
    [Community Area] [bit],
    [FBI Code][varchar](20),
    [X Coordinate] [varchar] (255),
    [Y Coordinate] [VARCHAR] (255),
    [Year] [int],
    [Updated On] [DATETIME],
    [Latitude] [NVARCHAR] (255),
    [Longitude] [NVARCHAR] (255),
    [Location] [NVARCHAR](255),
	[md_insert_datetime] [datetime]  NOT NULL,
	[md_insert_user] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL,
	[md_update_datetime] [datetime]  NOT NULL,
	[md_update_user] [varchar](40)  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
